text: hello I'm Andrew Knowlton the restaurant
and drinks editor here at Bon Appetit
and I'm going to show you how to flame
an orange twist for your cocktail first
you need a cocktail which we have here
and then the thing that kind of gives
this drink its signature is the flaming
orange twist don't laugh so first just
take a paring knife or any sharp knife
you have turn the orange in your hands
so that you get kind of the perfect
little circle of orange want to try to
avoid the pith if you can I like the
wood matches just like this you want to
hold it about four inches because you're
not trying to get the flame into the
drink you're just the essence of the
orange in there a little bit here and
then just squeeze and there you go and
that's really all there is to it for
more tips and techniques go to Bon
Appetit comm I'll do it one more time
for this so damn good
